name: V-RACE [ONLINE FPS]
description:
What is V-Race?

Tron [DISC Battles] like game.  Only one disk which is acting like boomerang. One hit and you are done for. Play with friends.

How to Host/Join?

Host via Hamachi / Radmin VPN. Create network and click on Host button.

Join via Hamachi / Radmin VPN. Join network, enter  IPV4 adress of host in adress bar, click on Join Button.

Can i play on Windows and my friend on Linux?

Yes, you can. Just use same game version. For Linux I recommend using Hamachi or open your ports.

How to change name, color?

Enter Player settings by clicking on player button. Choose your color, enter your name and press apply button, then click on done button.


Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump / Doublejump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

TAB - Scoreboard
